lead_paragraph: Chancellor George Osborne courted voters ahead of an election in 2015 with promises of help for savers, tax breaks for manufacturers and lower levies on beer and bingo.

headline.main: UK Government Offers Help to Savers, Factories, Brewers
headline.print_headline: UK Government Offers Help to Savers, Factories, Brewers

snippet: Chancellor George Osborne courted voters ahead of an election in 2015 with promises of help for savers, tax breaks for manufacturers and lower levies on beer and bingo....
